author: Simon Difford
description: The kiwi fruit flavour is a little lacking so this drink is improved by using kiwi-flavoured sugar syrup.
name: Kiwi Batida
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut kiwi in half and scoop flesh into blender
Add other ingredients and BLEND with 18oz scoop crushed ice until smooth
